name: CLAUDE.md Doctor
description: Diagnose and improve CLAUDE.md files and .claude/rules/
longDescription: Scans all project instruction files (root CLAUDE.md, package-level overrides, .claude.local.md, and .claude/rules/) across 8 diagnostic checks: command accuracy, architecture clarity, token efficiency (<300 lines), actionability, currency, gotcha coverage, rule modularity, and frontmatter correctness. Produces a scored health report with file-by-file grades and severity-classified findings (critical/warning/low), then offers 4 triage modes: fix all, critical-only, per-fix approval, or report-only. Includes 4 reference docs covering anti-patterns, quality criteria, rules-specific criteria, and templates for different project types.
